text: I just had a meeting with Aimee Craig from the Oregon Department of Education. Among other things we discussed, I wanted to think about doing a Thread(?) event that brings our two connections — Government and Design — together to discuss the role of innovation in government…

Not sure how many similar events there have been in Portland, but it felt like a relatively natural fit given our connects to Vroom, the Mayor, now the state government, innovation teams, advertising, etc.
That sounds great. I think we're aiming for a mid-june event for Thread
yeah - i was thinking something re: Hack as well
a bunch of unrelated people digging into problems together
